001package org.nasdanika.resources;
002
003import org.nasdanika.common.ProgressMonitor;
004
005/**
006 * Binds EntityContainer to T and {@link TypedEntity}&lt;T&gt;.
007 * This interface is intended to abstract clients from different implementations of typed entities and containers.
008 * @author Pavel
009 *
010 * @param <T> State type.
011 */
012public interface TypedEntityContainer<T> extends EntityContainer<T,TypedEntity<T>>, TypedResource<T> {
013                
014        /**
015         * Narrows return type.
016         */
017        @Override
018        TypedEntityContainer<T> getContainer(String path, ProgressMonitor monitor);
019        
020        /**
021         * Narrows return type.
022         */
023        @Override
024        TypedEntityContainer<T> getParent();
025        
026        /**
027         * Narrows return type.
028         */
029        @Override
030        TypedResource<T> find(String path, ProgressMonitor monitor);
031
032}
